Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_block

The function AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_block arranges for a sub-block of a 3D sample to be looped.

void AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_block(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  S32 loop_start_offset,
  S32 loop_end_offset
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to loop.
loop_start_offset
should be set to the offset of where looping should begin.
loop_end_offset
should be set to the offset of where looping should end.

Discussion

By default, looping a sound will loop the entire buffer. This function allows you to loop a smaller sub-section of the buffer.

A value of zero for loop_start_offset indicates the beginning of the sample, and a value of -1 for loop_end_offset indicates the end of the sample, regardless of its actual length.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_count
